main event: A bright star-like object with a blue halo was observed moving erratically in the sky.
interesting points: The object was seen by two persons with the naked eye., The object had a vapor trail that was more visible with binoculars., It displayed erratic movements and changed brightness., The same object was observed the night before above the airbase., An airplane passed beneath the object during the observation.
sighted object: a star-like object with a blue halo and vapor trail
witness description: civilian, contractor with some flying experience
